author: mmusich
body:
Adding key for Run2 pA simulation
# Summary of changes in Global Tags
## RunII simulation
- **RunII proton-Lead scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_pA_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_pA_v0) as [80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v17](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v17) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_pA_v0/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v17): 
  - change L1 menu for pA 2016 run (`L1Menu_HeavyIons2016_v0_xml`)

attn: @kkotov @mandrenguyen @jrcastle
title: Adding key for Run2 pA simulation
